post:
Hello All,

Are you looking for a Reliable VPS Hosting company which provides both quality and quantity at cheap rates?

eukVPS is a VPS Hosting company based in INDIA providing quality, reliable hosting solutions at an affordable price. Rest assured your data is safe, your site is working properly, and you're backed by the best support in the industry.

We offer 24/7/365 support, 99.9% uptime, and have a 7 day Money back guarantee.

We offer operating systems such as CentOS, Debian, Suse, and Fedora. You can also add on a range of control panels such as Cpanel, Webmin, Plesk

You can see all of our plans at
http://www.eukvps.com/vps

FAQ’s

Do you allow torrent ?
Ans: Yes, we do allow torrent to be hosted on our servers, but all contents should be legal in case we receive any abuse reports we will disable your account and inform you regarding it.


Do you allow proxies to be hosted on your servers ?
Ans : yes we allow php proxies, we do not allow anonymous proxies.


Is IRC allowed ?
Ans : Yes, we do allow IRC but only on our dedicated server plans.
